articles.title: Meet Microsoft Office's new default font: Aptos - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is changing the default font in Office apps for the first time in 16 years. Aptos is the new default to replace the widely used Calibri font.
articles.content:

articles.title: Turning green: Earth's oceans are changing colour due to climate change - Euronews
articles.description: NASA satellites show more than half of the Earth's oceans are green due to climate change disturbing marine ecosystems.
articles.content:
